title: Was Pepé Le Pew ‘Canceled’ Because of an NYT Op-Ed?
subtitle: Many took to social media to claim without evidence that the lecherous skunk was the latest "cancel culture" victim.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Warner Brothers cartoon character Pepe Le Pew was "canceled" from an upcoming sequel to "Space Jam" because a March 2021 New York Times op-ed said he "normalized rape culture."
